author: Paul Maxim
content:
Please don't take offense, Andreas, but my very first impression when I saw this image was "Omigod, Andreas has captured Captain Kirk and his away team beaming down to the surface of some alien planet!"  If you've seen any of the Star Trek movies, you know what I mean.  

Again, please don't be offended.  I can't recall ever seiing an image of yours I didn't like (including this one).  It was just the first thing that popped into my head.  Which tells you something, I guess, about where my head is at!
